ygData.subject: Re: balancing EQ with real life :)
ygData.msgSnippet: I understand where you are coming from. My fiance and I both play EQ. It s a lot of fun to be together but there are times when I wish we would go out instead
ygData.messageBody:
I understand where you are coming from. My fiance and I both play EQ. It's a
lot of fun to be together but there are times when I wish we would go out
instead of playing. We are both avid game players and play other MUD/
Strategy games as well as EQ.
I have noticed that EQ becomes VERY involved. And at times we have both
become obsessed with the game. That's just when the servers go down on the
weekend for emergncy matience or my cable modem goes down. hehe it makes us
realize that the world is still out there and we go do something else. Just
be patient. He'll get bored of it soon.

Elahana
